text: hello my name's Jared in this clip I'd
like to share some ideas with you for
preparing for a Cambridge English exam
make a revision plan it's important to
use the time you have to revise for the
exam try to be realistic when you make
your plan think about what you need to
know what you need to do how much time
you have and how you can fit what you
need to do in that
time any activities you do in English
will help you to improve reading a story
or a newspaper article is as helpful as
doing a grammar
exercise it is important to know exactly
what you need to do in the exam doing
some practice papers will help you
develop good exam techniques but don't
spend all your time doing exam practice
papers think about what areas you need
to improve ask your teacher if you're
not sure look back at the homework that
has been
corrected what mistakes did you make did
you understand where you went wrong what
were your
weaknesses these can then be key points
to focus on for your general English
Improvement if you'd like to know more
top tips visit the Cambridge English
website you'll find full practice test
and lots of other useful information in
the exam section this tip came from top
tips for fce booklet part of the
Cambridge English top tips series thanks
for watching
[Music]
